languages.text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт вытягивается от удивления и становится еще острее, а смущенный взгляд впивается в призрачные фигуры. Она молчит, и лишь украдкой переводит взгляд на вас, а затем обратно — cловно бы ждет чего-то.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт вытягивается от удивления и становится еще острее, а смущенный взгляд впивается в призрачные фигуры. Она молчит, и лишь украдкой переводит взгляд на вас, а затем обратно — cловно бы ждет чего-то.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet face lengthens, becoming even sharper, her embarrassed gaze trained upon the ghostly figures/ She stays silent, stealthily looking at you, then at the figures again — as if waiting for something.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet face lengthens, becoming even sharper, her embarrassed gaze trained upon the ghostly figures/ She stays silent, stealthily looking at you, then at the figures again — as if waiting for something.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特困惑地看着眼前幽灵般的幻影，面容因为惊讶而紧绷着，表情显得越发锐利。她没有说话，只是悄悄地瞥了你一眼，然后又将目光投向面前的幽影，似乎在等待着什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特困惑地看着眼前幽灵般的幻影，面容因为惊讶而紧绷着，表情显得越发锐利。她没有说话，只是悄悄地瞥了你一眼，然后又将目光投向面前的幽影，似乎在等待着什么。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Yrliet se tensa por la sorpresa, y sus facciones se marcan aún más mientras observa confundida las figuras fantasmales. No dice nada, solo te lanza miradas furtivas y luego vuelve a centrar su atención en las figuras, como si estuviese esperando algo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Yrliet se tensa por la sorpresa, y sus facciones se marcan aún más mientras observa confundida las figuras fantasmales. No dice nada, solo te lanza miradas furtivas y luego vuelve a centrar su atención en las figuras, como si estuviese esperando algo.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet se fige sur le coup de la surprise, ses traits deviennent encore plus nets tandis qu'elle observe les silhouettes fantomatiques. Confuse, elle ne dit rien et se contente de regarder à tour de rôle votre visage et les silhouettes, comme si elle attendait quelque chose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet se fige sur le coup de la surprise, ses traits deviennent encore plus nets tandis qu'elle observe les silhouettes fantomatiques. Confuse, elle ne dit rien et se contente de regarder à tour de rôle votre visage et les silhouettes, comme si elle attendait quelque chose.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Miene erstarrt überrascht, ihre Gesichtszüge werden noch schärfer, als sie verwirrt die geisterhaften Gestalten anstarrt. Sie sagt nichts, blickt dich und dann wieder die Gestalten an, als würde sie auf etwas warten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Miene erstarrt überrascht, ihre Gesichtszüge werden noch schärfer, als sie verwirrt die geisterhaften Gestalten anstarrt. Sie sagt nichts, blickt dich und dann wieder die Gestalten an, als würde sie auf etwas warten.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは、その顔立ちが鮮明になるほどに驚いて顔を強張らせつつ、ぼんやりとした人影を戸惑いとともに見つめている。彼女は何も言わず、何かを待っているかのようにあなたにちらりと視線を向けてから、再びその人影を見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは、その顔立ちが鮮明になるほどに驚いて顔を強張らせつつ、ぼんやりとした人影を戸惑いとともに見つめている。彼女は何も言わず、何かを待っているかのようにあなたにちらりと視線を向けてから、再びその人影を見た。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yüzü şaşkınlıkla geriliyor Yrliet'in ifadesi, hayaletimsi varlıklara şaşkınca bakarken daha da sertleşiyor. Hiçbir şey söylemiyor, sanki bir şey bekliyormuş gibi bir sana bir varlıklara bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face tenses in surprise, her features becoming even sharper as she stares in confusion at the ghostly figures. She says nothing, stealing glances at you, then at the figures again, as if she is waiting for something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in yüzü şaşkınlıkla geriliyor, ifadeleri hayaletimsi varlıklara şaşkınca bakarken daha da sertleşiyor. Hiçbir şey söylemiyor, sanki bir şey bekliyormuş gibi bir sana bir varlıklara bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
